mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.name, case when sm.id is null then 'F' else 'T' end checked from sys_permission t left join sys_module_permission smp on smp.permissionid = t.id and smp.moduleid=#{moduleid} left join sys_module sm on sm.id = smp.moduleid ORDER BY t.sequence ASC
